description:
'''Comedy hip-hop''' or '''comedy rap''' is a subgenre of [[Hip-hop|hip-hop music]] designed to be amusing or comedic, compared to artists who incorporate humor into their more serious, purist hip-hop styles.

'''Satirical hip-hop''' is a variant of comedy hip-hop done in a sarcastic, [[Parody|parodic]], or [[deadpan]] way.

Other forms of comedy rap, such as '''[[Internet meme|meme]] rap''' and '''ironic rap''', both known for their aggressive and dark comedic approaches, achieved some mainstream success during the 2000s and 2010s. Many examples of comedy hip-hop are parodic.

mixes.help_reason: Hard to find a single mix or playlist because this is such a diverse field, with a great many subjects being covered. Let me know if you find something that covers the breadth of the genre.
